traits.Dwarven Toughness: Maximum hit points increase by 1, and increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.Dwarven Armor Training: Proficiency with light and medium armor.

traits.Elf Weapon Training: Proficiency with longswords, shortswords, shortbows, and longbows.
traits.Cantrip: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.Elf Weapon Training: Proficiency with longswords, shortswords, shortbows, and longbows.
traits.Fleet of Foot: Base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

traits.Superior Darkvision: Can see in dim light within 120 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks relying on sight when in direct sunlight.

traits.Speak with Small Beasts: Can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts.

traits.Artificer’s Lore: Double proficiency bonus on checks involving alchemist’s supplies or tinker’s tools.
